detaileddescription.para: Type used to represent a location accuracy level in meters. The lower the value in meters, the more physically precise the location is. A negative accuracy value indicates an invalid location.
Type used to represent a locations age in seconds.
This constant indicates the minimum accuracy required before an update is generated.
This constant indicates the maximum age in seconds required before an update is generated.
Enum used to specify the authorization description

memberdef.definition: typedef void(^ LocationManagerUpdateBlock) (CLLocationManager *manager, CLLocation *location, NSError *error, BOOL *stopUpdating)
memberdef.name: LocationManagerUpdateBlock

detaileddescription.para: Block used to notify about updates to the location manager.
On success the updated location will be provided. If we have an error the location will be nil.

parameterdescription.para: The location manager that sends the update
Used if there was an error during update
Set this to YES in order to stop location updates

memberdef.definition: typedef void(^ HeadingUpdateBlock) (CLLocationManager *manager, CLHeading *heading, NSError *error, BOOL *stopUpdating)
memberdef.name: HeadingUpdateBlock

detaileddescription.para: Block used to notify about updates to the heading
On success the updated heading will be provided. If we have an error the location will be nil.

parameterdescription.para: The location manager that sends the update
Used if an error occurs during the update
Set this to YES in order to stop heading updates

detaileddescription.para: Block used to notify about changes to the authorization status

parameterdescription.para: The location manager that sends the status

detaileddescription.para: Block used to notify that the user entered a region
Block used to notify that the user exited a region
Block used to notify that monitoring failed for the specified region
Block used to notify that monitoring started for the specified region
Block used to notify about location updates
Block used to notify about a heading update
Block used to notify about location errors
Block used to confirm if calibration should be displayed

memberdef.definition: typedef void(^ DidDetermineStateBlock) (CLLocationManager *manager, CLRegionState state, CLRegion *region)
memberdef.name: DidDetermineStateBlock

detaileddescription.para: Block used to notify about a state transition for a monitored region
Block used to notify about beacon in region updates
Block used to notify about beacon in region failing updates
Block used to notify about location updates paused
Block used to notify about location updates resumed
Block used to notify about location updates will no longer be delivered
Block used to notify about new visit-related events
